mapper.sql: id, resource_id, resource_name, resource_desc, resource_type, resource_auth_type, resource_rows_count,resource_state resourceState, resource_hash_code resourceHashCode, resource_column_count, resource_column_name_list, resource_contains_y, resource_y_rows_count, resource_y_ratio, resource_tag, organ_id,user_name, is_del, c_time, u_time
mapper.insert: insert into fusion_resource (resource_id, resource_name, resource_desc, resource_type, resource_auth_type, resource_rows_count, resource_column_count, resource_column_name_list, resource_contains_y, resource_y_rows_count, resource_y_ratio, resource_tag,resource_state,resource_hash_code, organ_id,user_name, is_del, c_time, u_time) values (#{resourceId},#{resourceName},#{resourceDesc},#{resourceType},#{resourceAuthType},#{resourceRowsCount},#{resourceColumnCount},#{resourceColumnNameList},#{resourceContainsY},#{resourceYRowsCount},#{resourceYRatio},#{resourceTag},#{resourceState},#{resourceHashCode},#{organId},#{userName},0,now(),now())

insert into fusion_resource_tag (name, is_del, c_time, u_time) values
(#{item},0,now(),now())
mapper.select:
select id, resource_id, resource_tag from fusion_resource where resource_id in
#{item}

select distinct r.id,resource_id resourceId,resource_name resourceName,resource_desc resourceDesc,resource_type resourceType, resource_auth_type resourceAuthType,resource_rows_count resourceRowsCount,resource_column_count resourceColumnCount, resource_column_name_list resourceColumnNameList,resource_contains_y resourceContainsY,resource_y_rows_count resourceYRowsCount, resource_state resourceState,resource_hash_code resourceHashCode, resource_y_ratio resourceYRatio,resource_tag resourceTag,organ_id organId,user_name userName,r.is_del isDel,r.c_time cTime,r.u_time uTime from fusion_resource r
order by r.id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(distinct r.id) from fusion_resource r
select DISTINCT name from fusion_resource_tag
select , (select GROUP_CONCAT(organ_global_id) from fusion_resource_visibility_auth where resource_id = r.resource_id) authOrgans from fusion_resource r where resource_id = #{resourceId}

select , (select GROUP_CONCAT(organ_global_id) from fusion_resource_visibility_auth where resource_id = r.resource_id) authOrgans from fusion_resource r where resource_id in
#{item}

select
from fusion_resource_field where resource_id = #{resourceId}
mapper.insert:
insert into fusion_resource_visibility_auth (resource_id,organ_global_id, is_del, audit_status, apply_time, assign_time) values
(#{item.resourceId},#{item.organGlobalId},0, #{item.auditStatus}, #{item.applyTime}, #{item.assignTime})

select distinct r.id,resource_id resourceId,resource_name resourceName,resource_desc resourceDesc,resource_type resourceType, resource_auth_type resourceAuthType,resource_rows_count resourceRowsCount,resource_column_count resourceColumnCount, resource_column_name_list resourceColumnNameList,resource_contains_y resourceContainsY,resource_y_rows_count resourceYRowsCount, resource_state resourceState,resource_hash_code resourceHashCode, resource_y_ratio resourceYRatio,resource_tag resourceTag,organ_id organId,user_name userName,r.is_del isDel,r.c_time cTime,r.u_time uTime from fusion_resource r
order by r.id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(distinct r.id) from fusion_resource r

order by r.id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}

select distinct r.id,resource_id resourceId,resource_name resourceName,resource_desc resourceDesc,resource_type resourceType, resource_auth_type resourceAuthType,resource_rows_count resourceRowsCount,resource_column_count resourceColumnCount, resource_column_name_list resourceColumnNameList,resource_contains_y resourceContainsY,resource_y_rows_count resourceYRowsCount, resource_state resourceState,resource_hash_code resourceHashCode, resource_y_ratio resourceYRatio,resource_tag resourceTag,organ_id organId,user_name userName,r.is_del isDel,r.c_time cTime,r.u_time uTime from fusion_resource r

select distinct r.id,resource_id resourceId,resource_name resourceName,resource_desc resourceDesc,resource_type resourceType, resource_auth_type resourceAuthType,resource_rows_count resourceRowsCount,resource_column_count resourceColumnCount, resource_column_name_list resourceColumnNameList,resource_contains_y resourceContainsY,resource_y_rows_count resourceYRowsCount, resource_state resourceState,resource_hash_code resourceHashCode, resource_y_ratio resourceYRatio,resource_tag resourceTag,organ_id organId,user_name userName,r.is_del isDel,r.c_time cTime,r.u_time uTime from fusion_resource r
order by r.id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(distinct r.id) from fusion_resource r

select distinct r.id,r.resource_id resourceId,r.resource_name resourceName,r.resource_desc resourceDesc,r.resource_type resourceType, r.resource_auth_type resourceAuthType,r.resource_rows_count resourceRowsCount,r.resource_column_count resourceColumnCount, r.resource_column_name_list resourceColumnNameList,r.resource_contains_y resourceContainsY,r.resource_y_rows_count resourceYRowsCount, r.resource_state resourceState,r.resource_hash_code resourceHashCode, r.resource_y_ratio resourceYRatio,r.resource_tag resourceTag,r.organ_id organId,r.user_name userName,r.is_del isDel, r.c_time cTime,r.u_time uTime,frva.audit_status auditStatus from fusion_resource r left join fusion_resource_visibility_auth frva on r.resource_id = frva.resource_id
order by r.id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(distinct r.id) from fusion_resource r
